languages.text: {n}Глаза Риззы округляются.{/n} "Вы определенно знаете подход к сердцу старой Риззы! Осторожнее, а то оно и разорваться может. Конечно, идти против Чорда — безумие... Но разве за меньшее платят такую сумму".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза Риззы округляются.{/n} "Вы определенно знаете подход к сердцу старой Риззы! Осторожнее, а то оно и разорваться может. Конечно, идти против Чорда — безумие... Но разве за меньшее платят такую сумму".

languages.text: {n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, you don't get paid this much for anything less than madness."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Риззы округляются.{/n} "Вы определенно знаете подход к сердцу старой Риззы! Осторожнее, а то оно и разорваться может. Конечно, идти против Чорда — безумие... Но разве за меньшее платят такую сумму".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Careful it doesn't go pop. Of course taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, one doesn't get paid this much for anything less."

{n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Careful it doesn't go pop. Of course taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, one doesn't get paid this much for anything less."

{n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful, it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, one doesn't get paid this much for anything less."

{n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful, it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, one doesn't get paid this much for anything less."

{n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, you don't get paid this much for anything less than madness."

{n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, you don't get paid this much for anything less than madness."

languages.text: {n}莱萨瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“你可真是太懂老莱萨了！当心点，可别把这么大的饼掉到地上。是啊，和库尔达宣战简直是疯了……但话说回来，既然能拿到这么多钱，发点疯也是可以接受的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, you don't get paid this much for anything less than madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“你可真是太懂老莱萨了！当心点，可别把这么大的气球碰炸了。是啊，和库尔达宣战简直是疯了……但话说回来，既然能拿到这么多钱，风险高点也是难免。”

languages.text: {n}ライツァは目も見開いた。{/n}「ライツァ婆さんの心のつかみ方が上手いもんですね！でも、気を付けてください。チョーダを相手にするのは、狂気の沙汰ですが…しかし、狂気じゃなければ、これほどの報酬を得ることはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, you don't get paid this much for anything less than madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}ライツァは目も見開いた。{/n}「ライツァ婆さんの心のつかみ方が上手いもんですね！でも、気を付けてください。チョーダを相手にする事自体、狂気ではないが…それにしても、これほどの報酬を得ることはないでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Ryzza se abren de par en par.{/n} «¡Usted sí que sabe cómo ganarse el corazón de la vieja Ryzza! Tenga cuidado, no vaya a estallar. Por supuesto que enfrentarse a Chorda es una locura... pero nada está tan bien pagado como las locuras».
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, you don't get paid this much for anything less than madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Ryzza se abren de par en par.{/n} «¡Usted sí que sabe cómo ganarse el corazón de la vieja Ryzza! Tenga cuidado, no vaya a estallar. Por supuesto que enfrentarse a Chorda es una locura... Pero está bien pagado».

languages.text: {n}Ryzzas Augen weiten sich.{/n} "Ihr kennt den Weg zum Herz der alten Ryzza! Aber passt auf, dass es nicht platzt. Es mit Chorda aufzunehmen, ist natürlich Irrsinn ... Aber für weniger als Irrsinn bekommt man auch nicht so viel bezahlt."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, you don't get paid this much for anything less than madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzzas Augen weiten sich.{/n} "Ihr kennt den Weg zum Herz der alten Ryzza! Aber passt auf, dass es nicht platzt. Es mit Chorda aufzunehmen, ist natürlich Irrsinn ... Aber für weniger als Irrsinn bekommt man auch nicht so viel bezahlt."

languages.text: {n}Ryzza écarquille les yeux.{/n} « Vous savez ce qui fait battre le cœur de cette bonne vieille Ryzza, vous ! Attention, il ne faudrait pas qu'il s'emballe trop, à mon âge... Alors évidemment, s'attaquer à Chorda, c'est de la folie pure, mais bon, vous ne me paieriez pas autant pour une promenade de santé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's eyes widen.{/n} "You sure know the path to old Ryzza's heart! Be careful it doesn't go pop. Of course, taking on Chorda is madness... But then again, you don't get paid this much for anything less than madness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza écarquille les yeux.{/n} « Vous savez ce qui fait battre le cœur de cette bonne vieille Ryzza, vous ! Attention, il ne faudrait pas qu'il s'emballe trop, à mon âge... Alors évidemment, s'attaquer à Chorda, c'est de la folie pure, mais vous ne me paieriez pas autant pour une promenade de santé. »
